abstract: GlaxoSmithKline, which has been dealing with the bribery and corruption scandal at its China unit, also named Hervé Gisserot to head operations there.
snippet: GlaxoSmithKline, which has been dealing with the bribery and corruption scandal at its China unit, also named Hervé Gisserot to head operations there.
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI — The Chinese government released more details on Friday about its accusations involving GlaxoSmithKline, which has been rocked in recent weeks by a bribery and corruption scandal at its unit in China.

headline.print_headline: China Details Allegations Of Bribery Against Glaxo
